There's a lot of moaning about the Japanese conducting scientific experiements (read: killing whales) at the moment.
 
 But no one cares about the plankton! Whales kill millions of these defenceless creatures each year.
 
 No one cares about them! I say "Kill the whales! Save the plankton"
